name: Chandanalepa Charcoal Soap
description: Chandanalepa Charcoal Deep Cleansing Bar produced with activated charcoal derived from 100% natural coconut shells, absorbs toxins and removes impurities and excess oils from the skin. This unique product also detoxes the skin with its natural healing properties for acne, eczema and similar ailments afflicting sensitive skin. The bouquet of blended ayurvedic herbs removes dead skin cells, while nourishing the skin with each wash. Added natural Orange Oil ensures that skin stays healthy, adding a clear radiance and smooth feel. Chandanalepa Charcoal Soap is also ideal for makeup removal.
